# Covid19 Symptoms using UpSet.jsÂ¶



this is a visualization based on [UpSet.js](https://upset.js.org), see https://upset.js.org/integrations/r, https://upset.js.org/integrations/r/articles/basic.html, and https://github.com/upsetjs/upsetjs_r


```{r}
# devtools::install_url("https://github.com/upsetjs/upsetjs_r/releases/latest/download/upsetjs.tar.gz")
library(upsetjs)
```


data from: https://github.com/hms-dbmi/upset-altair-notebook

```{r}
ds <- as.data.frame(read.csv(url('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hms-dbmi/upset-altair-notebook/master/data/covid_symptoms_table.csv'), row.names=1))
```


```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=5, tidy=TRUE, fig.align='center'}
upsetjs() %>%
  fromDataFrame(ds) %>%
  interactiveChart()
```
